DOC.brief_summary: Study Design : multi-center , double-blind , placebo-controlled , randomize , parallel group , fix dose design Phase : Phase III
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Udenafil Treat Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Male patient age 20 year diagnose ED Had uncontrolled blood pressure Had hepatic renal dysfunction Was currently anticancer chemotherapy Had treatment ED use PDE5 inhibitor
